= Introduction =

Welcome to Units of Measure API.

Visit the Hudson CI Server for this project at: [http://hudson.geomatys.com/job/Unit-API/ http://hudson.geomatys.com/job/Unit-API/]

(special thanks to [http://geoapi.sourceforge.net/ GeoAPI])

= Scope =

  * Implementation of Units of Measure API
  ** Static Type Safe Units of Measure support (*Compile time* support)

The focus of the project is on *Java* implementations, but other languages both on the JVM or outside will be supported as appropriate, desired and/or contributed.
